Associated phytophagous mites :
Abacarus
sp. ( Eriophyidae ) on
P. guajava
and
P. guineense
;
Cosella
sp. and
Mesalox
sp. ( Eriophyidae ) on
P. guineense
;
Tenuipalpus
sp. ( Tenuipalpidae ) on
M. guianensis
,
M. venulosa
,
M. bellla
and
P. guajava
;
Oligonychus
sp. ( Tetranychidae ) on
P. cinereum
;
Oligonychus psidii Flechtmann
on
P. guajava
.

Remarks : The measurements of
7 adult
females collected are similar to those given in the original description. However, Z 5 is about 20 % shorter. This difference was also recorded by
Feres & Moraes ( 1998 )
and
Ferla & Moraes ( 2002 )
. The average measurements of females followed by the respective ranges (in parentheses) are: dorsal shield length 351 ( 325–375 ), width 228 ( 215–238 ), j 1 27 ( 25–28 ), j 3 38 ( 38–40 ), j 4 6 ( 5–8 ), j 5 5 ( 5–6 ), j 6 6 ( 5–8 ), J 2 7 ( 5–9 ), J 5 7 ( 5–9 ), z 2 12 ( 10–13 ), z 4 9 ( 8–11 ), z 5 5 ( 5–6 ), Z 1 8 ( 6– 10 ), Z 4 77 ( 73–80 ), Z 5 179 ( 160–193 ),
s 4 62
( 58–65 ),
S 2 9
( 8–11 ),
S 4 9
( 8–10 ),
S 5 9
( 8– 10 ), r 3 13 ( 10–15 ), R 1 11 ( 8–13 ), Sge
I 36
( 33–38 ), Sge

( 35–38 ), Sge

( 43–50 ), Sti
III 33
( 30–35 ), Sge

( 70–90 ), Sti
IV 53
( 50–55 ), St 55 ( 53–58 ), St 1 –St 3 56 ( 55– 58 ), St 2 –St 2 73 ( 70–75 ), St 5 –St 5 77 ( 75–80 ), length of ventrianal shied 111 ( 105–113 ), width at ZV 2 level 77 ( 75–80 ), width at anus level 77 ( 7–83 ), length of calyx of spermatheca 8 ( 8–10 ).

The measurements of a single male are: dorsal shield length 258 , width 160 , j 1 20 , j 3 30 , j 4 5 , j 5 5 , j 6 5 , J 2 5 , J 5 5 , z 2 8 , z 4 6 , z 5 5 , Z 1 6 , Z 4 58 , Z 5 113 ,

, width of ventrianal shield 140 at anterior corners, length of shaft of spermadactyl 15 . This is the first description of a male of this species.
